thread.title: BRIEF-Cenveo Inc Says Bankruptcy Court Approved Co's $290 Mln DIP Financing

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cenveo Inc Says Bankruptcy Court Approved Co's $290 Mln DIP Financing

organizations.name: brief-cenveo inc says bankruptcy court approved co

text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Cenveo Inc:
* CENVEO INC‘S $290 MILLION FINANCING FACILITY APPROVED
* CENVEO INC - BANKRUPTCY COURT APPROVED COMPANY‘S $290 MILLION DIP FINANCING
* CENVEO - BANKRUPTCY COURT APPROVED INTERIM RELIEF REQUESTED BY CO IN KEY FIRST DAY MOTIONS RELATED TO PAYMENT OF PRE-FILING WAGES, SALARIES, AMONG OTHERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
